p: To clarify the process of graphical representations and the differences between the multiple approaches, a short sequence of 10 bases, ATGAACACTC, is used as a standard example to generate plots using each of the methods mentioned here. The sequence denotes the stretch of first ten bases of the fourth segment of the influenza genome and the hemagglutinin (HA) gene, belonging to influenza A virus (A/Shenzhen/SP139/2014(H7N9)).
